channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024030613
item.description:
Report X-2024030613

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-20T15:11:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-13
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE DUE TO THE RATTLE OF AEROSOL CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (4) 15 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF MICROBAN 24 HOUR SANITIZING SPRAY. THERE ARE NO DANGERUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 4785W9, HORTON INC, 301 OCONEE BUSINESS PKWY, WESTMINSTER SC 29693-3157.

item.title: Report X-2024030589
item.description:
Report X-2024030589

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: KENAI
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN KENAI, ALASKA, ONE PACKAGE WAS DROPPED SPILLING THE INNER CONTENTS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE MW37V22-N LITHIUM ION BATTERY. PACKING SLIP INSIDE THE PACKAGE DESCRIBES THE CONTENTS AS ONE LITHIUM ION BATTERY. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGE. PRIOR TO THE UNDECLARED DISCOVERY THE PACKAGE HAD FLOWN SDF TO ANC AND ANC TO ENA. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM ILLINOIS USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 99F0V4, FIELD SHEER - SAN MARCOS, 2910 NORMAN STRASSE RD STE 1, SAN MARCOS CA 92069-5934.

item.title: Report X-2024030608
item.description:
Report X-2024030608

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-24
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: awb 31686266 was tendered as tools and a jacket. Accepting agent asked customer if there was any batteries since she was shipping power tools customer advised she was not. Upon screening saw what looked like lithium batteries. Open package and found 4 brand new 90 wh lithium-ion spare batteries.
